mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (review_content, email, review_image, review_point) VALUES (#{reviewContent}, #{email}, #{reviewImage}, #{reviewPoint})
mapper.select: SELECT R.*, U.user_id, A.camp_id, C.camp_name FROM review R LEFT JOIN user U ON R.email = U.email LEFT JOIN reservation A ON U.user_id = A.user_id LEFT JOIN Camping C ON A.camp_id = C.camp_id ORDER BY review_no DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{amount}

SELECT R.review_content, R.review_image, R.review_point, C.camp_name FROM review R LEFT JOIN user U ON R.email = U.email LEFT JOIN reservation A ON U.user_id = A.user_id LEFT JOIN Camping C ON A.camp_id = C.camp_id ORDER BY review_no DESC LIMIT 1
